attributes.title: Awful Representation of Our Nation
attributes.review: This app is utterly useless and a blatant defacement to this great country of ours. Not only is it pushing an anti-republican agenda, the Trump representatives were extremely inappropriate. They did not give my daddy trump the recognition he so rightly deserves in all of his racist glory. There were also tons of glitches that messed up my phone! Is this what we want representing the greatest nation in the world!!?? NOT MY AMERICA!! TRUMP WOULDNT EXPECT THIS TO BE THE IMAGE OF HIS PRESIDENCY. NOT MY HOLY PRESIDENT. 🤬🤬😠✨

attributes.title: It gave me a seizure
attributes.review: When I opened the app and seen Donald trump he made me want to puke with his orange self and it kinda disturbs me because I seen his pp and it small all I have to say is how he have kids with that little pp but anyways he reminds me of peaches I head he sucked a little kids pp behind  the school bleachers so nasty and the app is so laggy it won’t let me read of tap anything I hate this app I give it a BIG FAT JUICY 0!!!!!

attributes.title: It’s like spam
attributes.review: The app is like deplorable spam, once your personal info is entered you get harassed restlessly via spam texts, spam email etc. also the news is fake, it is made to fit his ideation only. Now who is the one cornering the market on fake news. This man is not what he seems. It’s time to dump trump, not that other party is any better. Both morally bankrupt. Don’t be fooled, They want us divided.

attributes.title: Trump is a white supremacist🤪🥰😍

attributes.title: ITS GAVE ME A VIRUS AND I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE 😤😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can stay updated with trump’s election after about a hour of having the app on my phone it started being really really really laggy then after I while it completely crashed I went to the Apple store and they asked if I had recently downloaded an app and I said yes told them the app they looked on to it and the app is FULL with viruses!?!?!? DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.title: Very mad software
attributes.review: My whole family likes there president so I downloaded this app to see if maybe I’m wrong and I should vote for the president but the app glitches so bad I have to restart my phone every 10 minutes the app isn’t that good itself and everything on it is LIES and am so glad I found this out before I voted for trump  now I have to get my phone fixed!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.title: How trump app is the worst and a Message for him
attributes.review: This is the worst app because the fact that he talks about the wall they he didn’t even build makes no sense like what I and it a scam to just get your phone number Bc when I put my phone number in it didn’t even work just a scam so TIKTOK  can get deleted but trump it going to hard if your reading this so just stop now.

attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist
attributes.review: Everything is completely confusing and I have no idea what’s going on,,, the design is tacky and it has no use in my phone either than to look pretty, if you can even consider it that. I can’t believe people lead me to believe this was actually I good app, honestly how can something so bad exist on the App Store, APPLE take it down its a terrible sight and it’s EMBARRASSING to see.

attributes.title: Caused tumor growth
attributes.review:
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
I got this app to see if I could turn republican and support dear Trumpie but the second I opened the app, I saw a picture of the bunker boy and my body physically rejected that sight. One week later, I am in the hospital because a 30 pound tumor had appeared between my eyeballs and my body I shutting down one organ at a time. So, I beg that you not get this app. Don’t let what happened to me, happen to you.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Don’t download this app it glitches and when I first downloaded it on to my phone thinking everything is fine but they sent me a message saying they know my address and all my emails accounts and everything about me so don’t don’t download it when u do they’re hacking you and your accounts and everything about you😡🤬
